Éamon.definition: the Elvis of 2024. he's a tall [white boy] with the curly [brown hair] of a bear. he is living mentally in 1920, as the man with the dog. secret man lover. Jk he LOVES women. curvy. Both him and the women he likes. Woohoo go Éamon. [You're the boss]
